channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- KEPServer Enterprise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- KEPServer Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2023-5908|2023-11-30T22:03:58.098Z -- rockwell%20automation -- kepserver%20enterprise
item.description: KEPServerEX is vulnerable to a buffer overflow which may allow an attacker to crash the product being accessed or leak information.

item.title: CVE-2023-5909|2023-11-30T22:05:59.595Z -- rockwell%20automation -- kepserver%20enterprise
item.description: KEPServerEX does not properly validate certificates from clients which may allow unauthenticated users to connect.

item.title: CVE-2023-0755|2023-02-23T21:23:19.210Z -- rockwell%20automation -- kepserver%20enterprise
item.description: The affected products are vulnerable to an improper validation of array index, which could allow an attacker to crash the server and remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-0754|2023-02-23T21:27:09.964Z -- rockwell%20automation -- kepserver%20enterprise
item.description: The affected products are vulnerable to an integer overflow or wraparound, which could Â allow an attacker to crash the server and remotely execute arbitrary code.
